1255440.name: Bizarre Barber Soundtrack
1255440.description: The Bizarre Barber OST is an apocalyptically funky mix of tunes to accompany our non-stop VR barbershop.  Original recordings by German artists Lobo Loco, Kie Lo Kaz, and Krude Mischung were remixed by Corey Bertelsen, who wrote a few original tracks with the help of Deniz Demirkurt, Maria Mishurenko, and Charles Mueller.
